short_description: como associates is a surveying services company based in united kingdom.
long_description: we specialise in providing an expert service to meet your property needs. we have extensive experience ranging from multi-million pound retail interior projects to new build design, and from residential home buyers surveys to large scale commercial estate transfers. successful projects since we began. previously known as 'condition reports' a level 1 survey is the most basic form of survey. this provides a reference in the future for any claims aimed towards you regarding the property's poor condition. our knowledge of building regulations spans across all sectors, from conservatories to shopping centres and everything in between. at como associates we pride ourselves on being able to deliver high quality projects in all settings. we understand that running a business can be stressful, at como associates we aim to provide a property management service that delivers a stress-free service from start to finish. project management and design of private function suite and residential accomodation.

generated_description: como associates is a multi-disciplinary construction consultancy firm based in bournemouth, england. the company provides a range of services including planning, surveying, and project management across the united kingdom. founded by a career main contractor and project manager, como associates aims to offer a comprehensive service for all property needs. the firm is accredited by the chartered institute of building (ciob), the chartered institute of architectural technologists (ciat), and regulated by the royal institution of chartered surveyors (rics). como associates specializes in commercial and residential property services, including new builds, refurbishments, and estate management. they are also members of the residential property surveyors association and the chartered management institute.
